page.title: 07THE ASHFIELD SHOW.
page.content: The Ashfield Show is the main event of the year in Sutton. Last year drawing a record of over 2,000 people. It was held on the 20th August,holding a fun packed day for everyone. The Red Devils Parachute display team and the motor-cycling display team were to add to the excitement of the day. The horticultural tents held bright flowers,vegetables,crafts,cakes and animals. The dog show had 1,126 entrants, having 140 classes.It is said to be the best dog show in the North. The fair ground was also an attraction for the day.There were also competitions,market stalls and hover- craft races.The Ashfield Show was organised by the Ashfield District Council. MELANIE CLARKE.
